Unnamed wife}} '''Uncle Sal''' is [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]'s uncle. In "[[The One With The Baby On The Bus]]", Joey and [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] watch [[Ben Geller|Ben]] while [[Ross Geller|Ross]] is at the hospital because of an allergic reaction to kiwi. As he is leaving, Ross (becoming less audible because of a swelling tongue) reminds them of important things to remember. Joey assures Ross that things will be fine. When Chandler asks "You understood that?", Joey remarks "My '''uncle Sal''' has a really big tongue". Chandler then asks "Is he the one with the beautiful wife?", to that Joey nods It is unclear whether Sal is on [[Joey Tribbiani Sr.|Joey Sr.]] or [[Gloria Tribbiani]]'s side of the family.
